translations: v．使固定；使专注：使某人或某物的注意力集中在某一点上，无法转移。
· He fixates on the idea of becoming a doctor.
他一心想成为一名医生。

sentences.sentence: Psychic thought energy has a body and form, which fixates in an accumulating way on material structures, inducing in such case, disaster and chaos.
sentences.translation: 精神思维能量有一个身体和形态，就会以积累的方式固定在物质结构上，这种情形引导天灾和混乱。

sentences.sentence: The length of the stops, when the eye fixates, varies from about 100 to 600 milliseconds and during this stop the brain starts to process the visual information received from the eyes.
sentences.translation: 当眼睛注视时，通常需要100至600毫秒，在每个点注视时大脑就开始处理从眼部接受到的视觉信息。

sentences.sentence: Our brains are actually paying attention to one event or thing which swallows up our attention, blocking out other inputs for short periods, then it releases and fixates on something else.
sentences.translation: 我们的大脑其实是在把注意力放在某一个吞噬了我们注意力的事件或事物上；将其它输入短时间内阻挡在外，随后，它释放开，又去关注于别的东西上面。
